title: Jehoshaphat’s Faith and Victory
summary: When Judah is threatened by a vast army, Jehoshaphat seeks the Lord in prayer and fasting. God answers through a prophet, and the people go into battle with worship instead of weapons. God causes the enemies to destroy each other.

faq.question: How did Jehoshaphat respond to the threat?
faq.answer: He led Judah in fasting, prayer, and worship instead of panic.

faq.question: How did God deliver Judah?
faq.answer: He caused the enemy armies to turn on each other, and Judah didn’t have to fight.
